ygData.subject: Guild Invite/Advise, etc.
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all! I am an Officer in the  guild on Bertoxxulous.  We are a new guild, about 3 weeks old now, and the highest member is
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all!
I am an Officer in the <Brethren of ill Omen> guild on
Bertoxxulous. We are a new guild, about 3 weeks old
now, and the highest member is currently 19th. I believe
I am the next highest in the guild at the moment.
Why am I telling you this? Many reasons actually.
First we are in need of more members as we have 17 right
now.
Second I don't want you to have any presumptions before
attempting to join.
Third we are tyring to make our presence known in
Norrath.

We are in the charter building stage, and have just
formed our Council of Elders. If anyone has experience
with the workings of a guild and positions like
Treasurer, please send me some advise that has been
beneficial.
Also where is a good place to host a guild webpage?
Geocities and any other that throws those stupid java
windows and "a word from our sponsor" messages suck, and
log my browser down, so I refuse to use those. Thanks.

In other news, I took a break from EQ this weekend and
only played a little on Friday night and long enough on
Sautrday for the guild meeting. I hope to level to 13th
soon as I am half way there. I would have made it
already, but I was helping my wife level in Nektulos
Forrest Friday from 4th to 8th. We didn't group and I
used Taunt, Slam and Siphon Strength while she took out
Red cons and got 1/2 a bubble of XP per creature. Most
of these were Even and Blue to me.
I died 3 times because of that damn Orc Runner in 45
minutes. Took me the rest of the night to get that XP
loss back too.

Any and all feedback welcome for guild info/advise,
thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
12th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
